center.p:
This preprint is available at the URI http://dlib.nyu.edu/awdl/isaw/isaw-papers/2/preprint as part of the NYU Library's Ancient World Digital Library in partnership with the Institute for the Study of the Ancient World (ISAW). More information about ISAW Papers is available on the ISAW website. Please note that both the specific content and appearance of this article may change prior to final publication. Additionally, links to third-party sites have been added as part of the editorial process and do not imply the endorsement of the authors. The final version will be published at:
http://dlib.nyu.edu/awdl/isaw/isaw-papers/2.
